message.body: Happiest of birthdays to you, my friend! Nice of ###### to consider it a holiday :)
Thank you! They exchanged it with a floating holiday, but I'm still observing. Did you get your ########? I was away for the weekend, but didn't see them
Awww man! And yeah, they showed up in my lobby finally. Someone must have figured it out and brought them over. Thanks for watching :)
